# Rive

> AI-powered restaurant operations platform. Algorithmic intelligence for gastronomic restaurants.

Rive is a SaaS platform that helps restaurant owners and managers streamline daily operations using artificial intelligence. Available in 14 languages with a 14-day free trial.

## Core Features

- **AI Logbook**: Intelligent digital logbook that analyzes staff notes, extracts keywords, detects urgencies, and suggests corrective actions automatically.
- **HACCP Compliance Assistant**: Monitors temperature logs, detects anomalies (e.g., fridge at 8Â°C), and proposes corrective actions for food safety compliance.
- **Food Cost Analysis**: Real-time food cost tracking with automatic updates when ingredient prices change.
- **14-Language Translation**: Interface and notes instantly available in Arabic, Bengali, Chinese (Simplified & Traditional), English, French, Hindi, Italian, Panjabi, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Tamil, and Turkish.
- **OCR Invoice Scanner**: Photograph supplier invoices to automatically extract line items, quantities, and prices using AI.
- **Menu Engineering Matrix**: Classifies dishes by popularity and profitability (Stars, Anchors, Drifts, Rocks) to optimize your menu.
- **POS Integration**: Connects natively with Toast, Square, SumUp, Stripe, Lightspeed, and Zettle point-of-sale systems.
- **Instagram Content Generator**: Creates complete social media posts with captions, hashtags, and CTAs tailored to each dish.
- **Reservation Sync**: Integrates with Libro, Resy, and Zenchef for real-time reservation management.
- **AI Prep Lists**: Cross-references reservations, historical sales, and recipes to generate precise preparation quantities.
